Articles.Content:
Recently purchased and downloaded 1.5. I can't launch the game normally, I just get a black screen. When I use the launcher, it says my installed version is "-1". Any ideas? I've taken the following actions:

Fresh install

Disk Utility "First Aid" function

Numerous restarts

@Nurrdeer

The launcher hasn't worked consistently for some time; for me, it says my installed version is "2332."

In the folder that you found the "KSPLauncher" in, there should be an application called "KSP." Try using that from now on.

If that doesn't fix your problem, it may help to know the model and OS of you mac.

 

Enjoy!

Edited October 17, 2018 by GearsNSuch
